description.english: Unlock Francois by finishing the first restaurant
description.german: Schalte Francois frei, indem du das erste Restaurant abschließt
description.french: Déverrouillez Francois en finissant le premier restaurant
description.italian: Completa il primo ristorante per sbloccare Francois
description.spanish: Finaliza el primer restaurante para desbloquear a Francois
description.russian: Разблокируй Франсуа, закончив работу в первом ресторане
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Francois door het eerste restaurant uit te spelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Francois concluindo o primeiro restaurante

description.english: Unlock Antonio by finishing the second restaurant
description.german: Schalte Antonio frei, indem du das zweite Restaurant abschließt

description.russian: Разблокируй Антонио, закончив работу во втором ресторане
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Antonio door het tweede restaurant uit te spelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Antonio concluindo o segundo restaurante

description.english: Unlock Patrick by finishing the third restaurant
description.german: Schalte Patrick frei, indem du das dritte Restaurant abschließt
description.french: Déverrouillez Patrick en finissant le troisième restaurant
description.italian: Completa il terzo ristorante per sbloccare Patrick
description.spanish: Finaliza el tercer restaurante para desbloquear a Patrick
description.russian: Разблокируй Патрика, закончив работу в третьем ресторане
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Patrick door het derde restaurant uit te spelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Patrick concluindo o terceiro restaurante

description.english: Unlock Richard by finishing the fourth restaurant
description.german: Schalte Richard frei, indem du das vierte Restaurant abschließt
description.french: Déverrouillez Richard en finissant le quatrième restaurant
description.italian: Completa il quarto ristorante per sbloccare Richard
description.spanish: Finaliza el cuarto restaurante para desbloquear a Richard
description.russian: Разблокируй Ричарда, закончив работу в четвертом ресторане
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Richard door het vierde restaurant uit te spelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Richard concluindo o quarto restaurante

description.english: Unlock Dainton Wu by finishing the fifth restaurant
description.german: Schalte Dainton Wu frei, indem du das fünfte Restaurant abschließt
description.french: Déverrouillez Dainton Wu en finissant le cinquième restaurant
description.italian: Completa il quinto ristorante per sbloccare Dainton Wu
description.spanish: Finaliza el quinto restaurante para desbloquear a Dainton Wu
description.russian: Разблокируй Дейнтона Ву, закончив работу в пятом ресторане
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Dainton Wu door het vijfde restaurant uit te spelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Dainton Wu concluindo o quinto restaurante

description.english: Unlock Emily by collecting ten thousand silver coins
description.german: Schalte Emily frei, indem du zehntausend Silbermünzen sammelst
description.french: Déverrouillez Emily en collectant dix mille pièces d’argent
description.italian: Ottieni diecimila monete d’argento per sbloccare Emily
description.spanish: Consigue 10.000 monedas de plata para desbloquear a Emily
description.russian: Разблокируй Джимми, собрав десять тысяч серебряных монет
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Emily door tienduizend zilveren munten te verzamelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Emily coletando dez mil moedas de prata

description.english: Unlock Julie, the Violinist, by buying all shop items in all restaurants
description.german: Schalte Julie, die Violinistin frei, indem du für alle Restaurants alle Objekte im Laden kaufst
description.french: Déverrouille Julieiee la violoniste en achetant toutes les améliorations dans tous les restaurants
description.italian: Acquista tutti gli oggetti in tutti i ristoranti per sbloccare Julie la violinista
description.spanish: Compra todos los artículos de la tienda en todos los restaurantes para desbloquear a Julie, la violinista
description.russian: Разблокируй Эви, купив все возможные товары во всех ресторанах
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Julie de vioolspeelster door alle spullen te kopen in alle restaurants
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Julie, a violinista, comprando todos os itens da loja em todos os restaurantes

description.english: Unlock Carl by finding the mouse in every level
description.german: Schalte Carl frei, indem du in jedem Level die Maus findest
description.french: Déverrouillez Carl en trouvant la souris dans chaque niveau
description.italian: Trova il topo in ogni livello per sbloccare Carl
description.spanish: Encuentra el ratón en todos los niveles para desbloquear a Carl
description.russian: Разблокируй Карла: найди мышь на каждом уровне
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Carl door de muis te vinden in elk level
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie Carl encontrando o rato em todos os níveis

description.english: Unlock Angela by achieving three stars on all days
description.german: Schalte Angela frei, indem du an allen Tagen drei Sterne erreichst
description.french: Déverrouillez Angela en gagnant trois étoiles sur chaque jour
description.italian: Ottieni tre stelle in tutti i giorni per sbloccare Angela
description.spanish: Logra 3 estrellas en todos los niveles para desbloquear a Angela
description.russian: Разблокируй Анжелу, получив три звезды в каждый день
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Angela door elke dag drie sterren te behalen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Angela recebendo três estrelas todos os dias

description.english: Unlock Snuggy & Rosie by collecting all the Memorable Moments
description.german: Schalte Snuggy & Rosie frei, indem du alle denkwürdigen Momente festhältst
description.french: Déverrouillez Snuggy et Rosie en immortalisant tous les moments mémorables
description.italian: Scatta tutte le foto per sbloccare Snuggy e Rosie
description.spanish: Consigue todos los momentos memorables para desbloquear a Snuggy y Rosie
description.russian: Разблокируй Снагги и Рози, собрав все памятные моменты
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Snuggy & Rosie door alle fotomomenten te verzamelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie Snuggy e Rosie coletando todos os momentos de fotos

description.english: Unlock Jimmy by collecting one thousand silver coins
description.german: Schalte Jimmy frei, indem du eintausend Silbermünzen sammelst
description.french: Déverrouillez Jimmy en collectant mille pièces d’argent
description.italian: Ottieni mille monete d’argento per sbloccare Jimmy
description.spanish: Consigue 1.000 monedas de plata para desbloquear a Jimmy
description.russian: Разблокируй Эмили, собрав одну тысячу серебряных монет
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Jimmy door duizend zilveren munten te verzamelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Jimmy coletando mil moedas de prata

description.english: Unlock Brigid by playing with every single product in the game
description.german: Schalte Brigid frei, indem du jedes Produkt im Spiel verwendest
description.french: Déverrouillez Brigid en ayant joué avec tous les produits du jeu
description.italian: Usa tutti i prodotti nel gioco per sbloccare Brigid
description.spanish: Utiliza todos los productos del juego para desbloquear a Brigid
description.russian: Разблокируй Эмили, использовав в игре каждый продукт в игре
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Brigid door elk product te gebruiken in het spel
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Brigid tocando cada um dos produtos no jogo

description.english: Unlock the Soccer Moms by letting Emily walk 9 miles
description.german: Schalte die Fußballmütter frei, indem du Emily 9 Kilometer laufen lässt
description.french: Déverrouillez les mères de famille en faisant marcher Emily sur 9 kilomètres
description.italian: Fai percorrere 9 km a Emily per sbloccare le mamme indaffarate
description.spanish: Haz que Emily recorra 9 kilómetros para desbloquear a las madres liberales
description.russian: Разблокируй домохозяек: пусть Эмили пройдет 9 миль
description.dutch: Ontgrendel de voetbalmoeders door Emily 9 kilometer te laten lopen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie as mães superprotetoras deixando a Emily andar 9 milhas

description.english: Unlock Evelyn by cleaning a table while customers are waiting for it
description.german: Schalte Evelyn frei, indem du einen Tisch abräumst, an dem bereits Gäste warten
description.french: Déverrouillez Evelyn en nettoyant une table que des clients attendent
description.italian: Pulisci un tavolo con dei clienti in attesa per sbloccare Evelyn
description.spanish: Limpia una mesa mientras los clientes esperan a que lo hagas para desbloquear a Evelyn
description.russian: Разблокируй Эвелин, убрав со стола, пока гости ждут
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Evelyn door een tafel af te ruimen terwijl er klanten naast staan te wachten
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Evelyn limpando uma mesa enquanto os clientes esperam por ela

description.english: Unlock the Foodies by getting a 3-customer bonus two times in a row
description.german: Schalte die Feinschmecker frei, indem du zwei Mal nacheinander einen 3-Kunden-Bonus erhältst
description.french: Déverrouillez les foodies en obtenant 3 bonus client deux fois à la suite
description.italian: Ottieni un bonus 3 clienti due volte di fila per sbloccare i gourmet
description.spanish: Consigue dos veces seguidas una bonificación de 3 clientes para desbloquear a los sibaritas
description.russian: Разблокируй любителей поесть, получив бонус от 3 клиентов два раза подряд
description.dutch: Ontgrendel de bourgondiërs door twee keer op een rij een drieklantenbonus te krijgen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie os viciados em comida conseguindo um bônus de 3 clientes duas vezes seguidas

description.english: Unlock Elvis by using your register one thousand times
description.german: Schalte Elvis frei, indem du die Kasse eintausend Mal benutzt
description.french: Déverrouillez Elvis en utilisant la caisse enregistreuse mille fois
description.italian: Usa il registratore di cassa mille volte per sbloccare Elvis
description.spanish: Usa la caja registradora 1.000 veces para desbloquear a Elvis
description.russian: Разблокируй Элвиса: используй кассу тысячу раз
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Elvis door je kassa duizend keer te gebruiken
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Elvis usando a registradora mil vezes

description.english: Unlock Sid, the Cleaner by burning ten dishes and still completing the day with three stars
description.german: Schalte Sid, die Aushilfe, frei, indem du zehn Gerichte verbrennen lässt und den Tag dennoch mit drei Sternen abschließt
description.french: Déverrouillez Sid le nettoyeur en laissant brûler trois plats tout en finissant la journée avec trois étoiles
description.italian: Brucia dieci piatti e completa il giorno con tre stelle per sbloccare Sid lo sguattero
description.spanish: Achicharra diez platos y completa el día con 3 estrellas para desbloquear a Sid, el limpiador
description.russian: Разблокируй уборщика Сида: сожги десять блюд, но заверши день с тремя звездами
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Sid de schoonmaker door tien gerechten te laten aanbranden en de dag toch af te sluiten met drie sterren
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Sid, o limpador, queimando dez pratos e concluindo o dia com três estrelas

description.english: Unlock Edward by ??????? (Hint: “Knock Knock”)
description.german: Schalte Edward frei, indem du ??????? (Hinweis: „Klopf-Klopf“)
description.french: Déverrouillez Edward en ??????? (Indice : « Toc Toc »)
description.italian: ??????? per sbloccare Edward (indizio: toc toc)
description.spanish: ??????? para desbloquear a Edward (Pista: “Toc-toc”)
description.russian: Разблокируй Эдварда: ??????? (подсказка: ''Тук-тук'')
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Edward door ??? (Tip: “klop klop”)
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Edward fazendo: ??? (dica: “Toc toc”)

description.english: Unlock Kate by finding all hidden objects in the game
description.german: Schalte Kate frei, indem du 10 versteckte Objekte im Spiel findest
description.french: Déverrouillez Kate en trouvant 10 objets cachés dans le jeu
description.italian: Trova 10 oggetti nascosti nel gioco per sbloccare Kate
description.spanish: Encuentra 10 objetos ocultos en el juego para desbloquear a Kate
description.russian: Разблокируй Кейт: найди 10 спрятанных предметов в игре
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Kate door 10 verborgen voorwerpen te vinden in het spel
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Kate encontrando 10 objetos ocultos no jogo

description.english: Unlock the ducks by collecting every other person
description.german: Schalte die Enten frei, indem du alle Charaktere freischaltest
description.french: Déverrouillez les canards en déverrouillant tous les autres personnages
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le altre persone per sbloccare le paperelle
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los personajes para desbloquear a los patos
description.russian: Разблокируй уток, открыв всех возможных людей
description.dutch: Ontgrendel de eenden door elk andere personage te ontgrendelen
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie os patos coletando todas as pessoas
